measurements.activationTimeMs: Time taken to activate the extension in milliseconds

events.name: Gulp Publish Project
events.description: User executed gulp publish task (bundle + package)

events.name: Execute Terminal Command
events.description: User executed an NPM script from the tasks view

properties.script: Name of the NPM script executed (e.g., 'lint', 'watch')

events.name: Heft Publish Project
events.description: User executed heft publish task (build + package)

events.name: Validate Project
events.description: User validated SPFx project structure and dependencies

events.name: Grant API Permissions
events.description: User granted API permissions for the project

events.name: Deploy Project
events.description: User deployed the project to an app catalog

events.name: Scaffold CI/CD Workflow
events.description: User generated a CI/CD pipeline configuration

events.name: Add Component to Project
events.description: User added a new component to an existing project

events.name: View Samples Gallery
events.description: User opened the SPFx samples gallery

events.name: Use @spfx in GitHub Copilot
events.description: User opened GitHub Copilot chat with @spfx participant

events.name: Create New Project
events.description: User created a new SPFx project

events.name: Validate Local Setup
events.description: User validated their local development environment setup

events.name: Add Tenant App Catalog
events.description: User added a tenant-wide app catalog

events.name: Copy App
events.description: User copied an app in the app catalog

events.name: Deploy App
events.description: User deployed an app in the app catalog

events.name: Disable App
events.description: User disabled an app in the app catalog

events.name: Enable App
events.description: User enabled an app in the app catalog

events.name: Install App
events.description: User installed an app to a site

events.name: Move App
events.description: User moved an app in the app catalog

events.name: Remove App
events.description: User removed an app from the app catalog

events.name: Retract App
events.description: User retracted an app in the app catalog

events.name: Uninstall App
events.description: User uninstalled an app from a site

events.name: Upgrade App
events.description: User upgraded an app in the app catalog

events.name: Add Site App Catalog
events.description: User added a site collection app catalog

events.name: Remove Site App Catalog
events.description: User removed a site collection app catalog
